com.javasbar.smart.framework.lib.common

Class RemoteClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.javasbar.smart.framework.lib.common.RemoteClient

  • public class RemoteClient
extends Object
    RemoteClient for ssh'ing.
    Author:
    Basavaraj M

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RemoteClient(String key, org.apache.commons.configuration.CompositeConfiguration configuration)
      All the authentication, address info related to the m/c for which
      ssh has to be done will be provided in configuration with key names
      starting with "key_"
      For example if key=feed1 then, parameters that would be searched for are;
      feed1_userName, feed1_password...
      RemoteClient(String address, String userName, String password, com.xebialabs.overthere.OperatingSystemFamily os, com.xebialabs.overthere.ssh.SshConnectionType sftp) 
      RemoteClient(String address, String userName, String privateKeyFileLocation, String passPhrase, com.xebialabs.overthere.OperatingSystemFamily os, com.xebialabs.overthere.ssh.SshConnectionType connectionType)

      • RemoteClient

        public RemoteClient(String key,
            org.apache.commons.configuration.CompositeConfiguration configuration)
        All the authentication, address info related to the m/c for which
        ssh has to be done will be provided in configuration with key names
        starting with "key_"
        For example if key=feed1 then, parameters that would be searched for are;
        feed1_userName, feed1_password...
        Parameters:
        key -

      • RemoteClient

        public RemoteClient(String address,
            String userName,
            String password,
            com.xebialabs.overthere.OperatingSystemFamily os,
            com.xebialabs.overthere.ssh.SshConnectionType sftp)
        Parameters:
        address - - host address
        userName - - userName to be used for login
        password - - password to be used for login
        os - - OS name - use OperatingSystemFamily.UNIX / OperatingSystemFamily.WINDOWS
        connectionType - - SshConnectionType.SFTP / .SCP / .SFTP_CYGWIN / .INTERACTIVE_SUDOJ / .SUDO / .TUNNEL
        sftp -

      • RemoteClient

        public RemoteClient(String address,
            String userName,
            String privateKeyFileLocation,
            String passPhrase,
            com.xebialabs.overthere.OperatingSystemFamily os,
            com.xebialabs.overthere.ssh.SshConnectionType connectionType)
        Parameters:
        address - - host address
        userName - - username to be used for login
        privateKeyFileLocation - - location of private key file ex: ~/.ssh/id_rsa
        passPhrase - - passphrase used during ssh keygen
        os - - os name
        connectionType -

      • getConnectionKey

        public String getConnectionKey()
        Returns the 'key' which decides which host to connect to; i.e. key='feed1' then, connection is made to configured value for the key feed1_hostName.
        Returns:
